name: Play These Games With A Mouse
name_original: Play These Games With A Mouse
description:
These games started as a set of entries into a Glorious Trainwrecks contest in 2012, and I liked the format, so I just kept making them.

The style and design of the games is heavily derived from Commodore 64 games, I was reading a lot about the system at the time I made these.

You will need a mouse or trackball to play these games, a touchpad or touchscreen isn't going to cut it. Also, your experience will be vastly enhanced by installing this free font.

If you play the games and enjoy them, let me know. You can contact me on twitter @metalsnail or on My Tumblr. Let me know your high score too!

Music was made using Drum Circle. Sounds were made using Bfxr.
